attributes.action: INVEST IN THE REPAIR OF PEAT BOGS WHICH PRODUCE 3 TIMES MORE C02 IMMISIONS THAN THE AIRLINE INDUSTRY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BBC Fri 14th March highlighted the fact that damaged peat bogs in the UK cause 3 times more C02 emmisions than the airline industry.Why have Green Peace not been demonstrating against this? We could utilise all sorts of people to repair these bogs(Apparantly they are repairable)This might be what is required to save the world from global warming. Repair all Peat Bogs throughout the UK.
